Description.Text:
Voted #1 Speciality lodging in Wailea by tripadvisor.

VIP WELCOME-Fresh flower lei greeting, mango iced tea and personal escort to your villa await you. Ideal oceanfront location, elegant private residences. 98 penthouses and villas ranging in size from 1,900 to 3,100 square feet offering both two and three bedrooms. Our gated community offers 24-hour security, as well as exclusive access to individual residences through private elevatorsAll units are appointed with the finest linens and bathroom amenities, upgraded indoor and outdoor furnishings and large lanais with built-in barbecues.

Ocean view units provide spectacular panoramic views. All ground floor Villas have private plunge pools and outdoor showers adjacent to master bathrooms, first floor Penthouse do not have these features. All residences have large private lanais equipped with built-in barbecues with Viking exhaust hoods.

Twenty elevators on the property feature private key-controlled access to every room. Complimentary high-speed Internet access and wireless capability. Central air-conditioning with multi-zone controls and ceiling fans in all great rooms and bedrooms. European kitchens featuring state-of-the-art appliances and housewares. Two pools and Jacuzzis with Pool Attendants. State-of-the-art Fitness Facility with locker rooms and showers.

All rooms at standard rates have daily housekeeping. Promotional Escape rates have only limited housekeeping. **LIMITED HOUSEKEEPING Wailea Beach Villas: Every Third Day Linen Service - Every third day of stay (arrival day is considered day one, day two is day after arrival, day three is third day). Wailea Beach Villas will provide a Linen Service (housekeepers will completely vacuum penthouse/villa, change bed linens, clean lanai table tops and floors, change soiled bathroom towels, restock and clean bathrooms, kitchen, load dishwasher, remove trash, sweep and mop floors, dust furniture, and clean tabletops). If the Every Third Day Linen Service falls on the day before departure, bed linens will not be changed as part of our commitment to the environment and the Destination Earth water conservation program.

Optional Service: If a guest wishes to purchase housekeeping services above and beyond the Every Third Day Linen Service, associated charges are as follows: Linen Service (described above) - $150 plus tax for One Bedroom Units, $200 plus tax for Two Bedroom Units and $220 plus tax for Three Bedroom Units.

Check-in is at the Wailea Gateway Shopping Center, 34 Wailea Gateway Place, Suite A102, opposite end of the Pita Paradise building. You must check-in at this location between the hours of 8AM and 9PM to receive keys and directions to your condominium. If arriving between 9PM and 8AM check in at Wailea Beach Villas, located at 3800 Wailea Alanui Drive (first entrance on your right after the Shops at Wailea). The Security Guard will direct you to your property and provide you with a key. Phone number is 808-891-4520.
Located directly behind the Shops at Wailea.

Two Bedroom Penthouse - 1900 square feet Exquisite private landing entrances lead you into a large great room with immense windows. The Penthouse offers either an expansive garden or ocean view. The great room is open to a completely gourmet kitchen featuring two sub zero fridges and granite counter tops. Two bathrooms provide convenience and privacy. The master bathroom features a double vanity, deep soaker tub, marble shower and spacious walk in closet.
Three Bedroom Penthouse - 2100 to 2500 square feet Enter through your private elevator to an exquisite entrance of your personal retreat space. Home away from Home. Welcome into the great room with immense windows showcasing an expansive garden or ocean view. The great room is open to a completely equipped gourmet kitchen featuring two sub zero fridges and granite counter tops. Three bathrooms provide convenience and privacy. The master bathroom features a double vanity, deep soaker tub, marble shower and a spacious walk-in closet. The bedrooms are appointed with luxurious 100% Egyptian-cotton bed linens. Private lanais feature built in barbecues. All accommodations include the comforts of centralized air conditioning , and ceiling fans in every room.
Three Bedroom Villa with Plunge Pool - 3100 square feet Step outside your lanai and directly into your own private plunge pool. These ground floor villas also have exquisite entrances that lead you to a large great room with immense windows. They offer expansive garden or ocean views. The great room is open to a completely equipped gourmet kitchen featuring two sub zero fridges and granite counter tops. Three bathrooms provide convenience and privacy. The master bathroom features a double vanity, deep soaker tub, marble shower and a spacious walk-in closet. The bedrooms are appointed with luxurious 100% Egyptian-cotton bed linens. Private lanais feature built in barbecues. Directly off of the lanai, the luxury of private plunge pools are found amid tropical landscape. All accommodations include the comforts of centralized air conditioning , and ceiling fans in every room.
Three Bedroom Villa -Upper Floor - 3100 square feet Located on either the second or third floor.
Nestled amongst the beautiful landscaped gardens and waterfalls, the Villas have exquisite private entrances leading you into a large great room with immense windows. You feel surrounded by nature enjoying your expansive garden or ocean view. The great room is open to a completely equipped gourmet kitchen featuring two sub zero fridges and granite counter tops. Three bathrooms provide convenience and privacy. The master bathroom features a double vanity, deep soaker tub, marble shower and a spacious walk-in closet. The bedrooms are appointed with luxurious 100% Egyptian-cotton bed linens. Private lanais feature built in barbecues. All accommodations include the comforts of centralized air conditioning, and ceiling fans in every room.
